subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
If you want to have a sked on 40 meters, I'm interested!  That's probably 
the best band right now.  My 75 meter antenna doesn't do so well.

Zack (W9SZ)

On Mon, 3 Dec 2007, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
> From a recent add for another presentation, but apparently the rest of 
> us get nothing like this, so it doesn't even work for us. Guess I'll 
> just go back to killing time wth Ham radio, and quit wasting all my 
> time and money on useless boxes.
>
